ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD continues its slide into mediocrity with issue #522 – on sale now! It features our full spoofs ofThe HobbitandStorage Wars! We also mock Catfishing, take a look at Proactiv for Zombies and eavesdrop on what was overheard in Kim Kardashian’s delivery room! Plus, Planet Tad, the MAD Fold-In, Spy vs. Spy, the MAD Strip Club and much, much more! So hurry up and get it today – urine for a treat!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:28:51. [Issue ID 418809]
